mapper.select: select gk.ko_id `ko_id`, count(kh.hit_id) `count` from sr_hits kh join genes_ko gk on gk.gene_idx=kh.gene_idx where kh.tag=#{sample_tag} group by gk.ko_id
select gk.ko_id `ko_id`, count(kh.hit_id) `count` from so_hits kh join genes_ko gk on gk.gene_idx=kh.gene_idx where kh.tag=#{sample_tag} group by gk.ko_id

select count(kh.hit_id) cnt, oi.* from sr_hits kh join organisms_of_interest oi on oi.organism_idx=kh.organism_idx join genes_ko gk on gk.gene_idx=kh.gene_idx where kh.tag=#{tag_id} and gk.ko_id=#{ko_id} group by oi.code order by cnt desc limit 1;
